question: Which of the following best describes autogenic succession?
option1: It is the succession brought about by autotrophes
option2: It is the ecological succession brought about by the living inhabitants of the community itself
option3: It is the succession brought about by the external forces
option4: It is the succession brought about in ecosystem not inhabited
answer: It is the ecological succession brought about by the living inhabitants of the community itself
explanation: Autogenic succession is brought about by the living inhabitants of the particular community only rather than the outside forces.
